title: The Missing Citizens
description: Find all citizens who live in the 'Downtown' district.
story: Welcome, Data Detective! Reports have come in that citizens in Downtown are missing from official records. Your job is to query the citizens table and find everyone who lives in Downtown.
hint: Use SELECT with a WHERE clause to filter by district.
tableSetup: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS citizens (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100), district VARCHAR(50), age INTEGER); INSERT INTO citizens (name, district, age) VALUES ('Alice', 'Downtown', 28), ('Bob', 'Uptown', 34), ('Carol', 'Downtown', 22), ('David', 'Midtown', 45), ('Eve', 'Downtown', 19) ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING;
